text: is a town located in Sorachi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 6,787, and a population density of 14 persons per km². The total area is 495.62 km². In 1890, the people from Totsukawa in Nara Prefecture reclaimed land. ==Notable people from Shintotsukawa== *Yoshio Hachiro, politician ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Shintotsukawa, Hokkaido
